title: After Depositing $1,000,000,000, Apple Banking Customers Are Struggling to Access Their Money
description:
After depositing more than $1,000,000,000 in a matter of weeks, Apple savings account customers say they are now struggling to withdraw their funds. In mid-April, the iPhone creator teamed up with financial behemoth Goldman Sachs to allow Apple Card users to earn interest through a savings account. The Wall Street Journal reports that some customers […]

The post After Depositing $1,000,000,000, Apple Banking Customers Are Struggling to Access Their Money appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
